SEARCH
Module edu.qut.cab302.wehab
Package edu.qut.cab302.wehab.models.medication

Class MedicationReminder

java.lang.Object
edu.qut.cab302.wehab.models.medication.MedicationReminder
public class MedicationReminder extends Object
This class represents a medication reminder. It includes details such as the reminder ID, username, medication ID, dosage amount, dosage unit, date, time, and status of the reminder.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Static inner builder class for constructing MedicationReminder objects.
